metadata.dc:author: Castel, T
Lecha, M
Castro, J
Mascaró, J M
metadata.dc:description: The results of the treatment of psoriatic erythroderma are variable in different references. The authors describe the treatment of three patients and emphasize the immuno-modulatory action of etretinate on polymorphonuclears, monocytes and Langerhans cells and the possibility of an action on prostaglandins.
metadata.dc:title: Efectos secundarios inhabituales en enfermos con eritrodermia psoriásica tratados con etretinato (RO 10-9359).
[Unusual side effects in patients with psoriatic erythroderma treated with etretinate (RO 10-9359)].
